title: 2003 Math OSK, Number 1: Divisibility by 9
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Amongst the numbers 20000002, 20011002, 20022002, 20033002, how many are divisible by 9?"}]}]}

title: 2003 Math OSK, Number 2: Even Even Even Even
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many 4-digit numbers are there that are entirely made out of even numbers and not a multiple of 2003?"}]}]}

title: 2003 Math OSK, Number 3
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Today I am one third the age of my father. 5 years ago, I was one fourth of my father's age. What is my current age?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"According to the question the following equation can be formed:(Let the father's age be x)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1/3x-5=1/4(x-5)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=45"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so your age is 1/3x=1/3*45=15 "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"But you have turned 16:)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            I wish you had mentioned that it was "one fourth of my father's age 5 years ago" too...a tiny detail :)

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}
